name: PosturalBalanceTrainingProcedureSNOMED
title: Postural Balance Training Procedure (SNOMED)
description: This value set includes SNOMED codes for non-surgical, non-device related, and non-pharmaceutical related training interventions to improve postural balance.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains SNOMED codes for physical training interventions used to improve postural balance.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients who receive training interventions to improve postural balance. This element may map to the "Procedure" Category of the Quality Data Model.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes physical training interventions.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes educational procedures that do not include a physical training component. Excludes surgical procedures and medical procedures that involve devices or pharmaceuticals.)
